entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
